title: Newly Renovated Apartments with Easy Access to I-580
posting_body: Enjoy the convenience and beauty of the Livermore Valley in our beautiful residences at Diablo Vista Apartments.
Located on nine richly landscaped acres, this residential community is truly special.
Here you will enjoy the convenience of easy access to Interstate 580, great schools, excellent shopping and entertainment plus lots of options for outdoor adventures.
Diablo Vista is proud to offer distinctive residences and exceptional community amenities that make coming home a pleasure — all in a park-like setting with a charming neighborhood feel.
Pet Policy: We welcome 2 pets per apartment home.
There is a $500 pet deposit per animal.
There is a weight limit of 35 lbs per pet, and aggressive breeds are prohibited.
Please call our Leasing Office for complete Pet Policy information.
Check out our virtual tour on our website at <URL>
Pricing and availability are subject to change daily.
Photos may not be of the exact advertised unit.
Please contact us today for the most up to date information!
